mapper.sql: id, rule_scope, technician_id, service_item_id, commission_type, commission_value, enabled, tenant_id, delete_flag
mapper.insert: insert into jsh_commission_rule (id, rule_scope, technician_id, service_item_id, commission_type, commission_value, enabled, delete_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ruleScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{technicianId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serviceItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{commissionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commissionValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into jsh_commission_rule
id, rule_scope, technician_id, service_item_id, commission_type, commission_value, enabled, delete_flag,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ruleScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{technicianId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serviceItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{commissionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commissionValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update: update jsh_commission_rule set rule_scope = #{ruleScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, technician_id = #{technicianId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, service_item_id = #{serviceItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, commission_type = #{commissionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commission_value = #{commissionValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select * from jsh_commission_rule where enabled = b'1' and ifnull(delete_flag,'0') != '1'
and tenant_id = #{tenantId}
